text_block_list.text:
A few days after my badge had been found―― 
I saw Fuji Kiseki, talking with an underclassman in front of the 
school gates.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ――I see. So that's why you haven't been feeling well lately.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Yes… I, I wanted to be like my big sister, who's working so 
hard at the Twinkle Series… but with grades like these, it's 
impossible, isn't it.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
My sister was received as a "Fully-fledged Uma Musume" 
when she was about my age… 
I guess I just don't have any talent after all…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hmm…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
― 'Alas, the sword is too heavy for my arms. 
My legs are bruised by the thorns, and I can no longer seem to 
take a step forward.'

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
'All the heroes who saved people in the past ran up this 
thorny slope, proudly carrying their swords as proof of their 
salvation.'

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
'But, I myself can't do it. I can't seem to do it. 
If I cannot bear the weight and the pain, am I not qualified to 
be a hero?――'

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Senpai…?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Overcome with despair, she falls to the ground. 
But then, a girl appears, who has been watching over her 
since she was a child.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
The girl speaks to the crumbled hero. 
――'The qualifications will always be in your hands, so long 
as you don't throw them away.'

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
'Please don't forget your will to seize it yourself. Even without 
a sword, even if you cannot run up, you have your own way.'

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Later, the hero left her sword and armor behind and jumped 
over the thorny hill with only her own two legs. With her 
well-trained fists, she vanquished evil and became a hero of 
salvation.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I believe in the days of training you have accumulated, and in 
your own will… Don't you?

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Days of training, my own will…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Precisely! Instead of blaming yourself for what you can't do 
like your sister, take a look at yourself some more.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: You have a path that only your legs can take you down!

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Fuji-senpai…!

The junior was in tears for a while as if she had been overcome 
with emotion, but Fuji Kiseki gently patted her on the back, 
and before long, the underclassman left with a completely new 
look on her face.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Oh? Could it be, the Trainer from the other day?
choice_data_list: That was a great pep talk!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Whoops, you saw that. 
Ah, that was a private discussion, so keep it a secret for me, 
alright?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That girl, I hope she's feeling better. 
If it seemed that way to an outside observer, I wonder if I 
was able to give her peace of mind?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
How do I say this, I know it's tough to smile 24/7, but… 
At the very least when I'm around, I want to make them feel 
bright and cheerful.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
My words alone may be weak, so I quoted a line from a play of 
my mother's that I once saw――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'm glad if that girl's heart is just a little lighter.
choice_data_list: Is your mother a stage actress?
Is your mother a stage actress?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Yes! 
My mom is pretty famous in her neighborhood.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
My mother's acting is simply incredible!! 
She would appear onstage and say just a few words, and 
everyone wouldn't be able to take their eyes off of her.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
When the show was over, of course, there was thunderous 
applause that never stopped! The smiles on the faces of the 
audience at that moment is something to behold…!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: My mom, she's the best entertainer I know!!
choice_data_list: So, that's why you try to entertain people too?
So, that's why you try to entertain people too?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Well, I suppose it all started because I admired my mother's 
image. 
That's why I thought about going into theater at first, but――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Of course, I didn't end up… exactly like my mother. 
I suffered a lot of pain from the gap between what I wanted to 
be and what was reality.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But then my mother said to me, quoting the same line as 
before. 
'There is more than one way. There is more than one path.'

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That's how I came across, in my search for a new 
path… races.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: On my first run on the turf, I――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …Ahh, that's right. I was just about to enter a mock race.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: If you'd like, you should come and watch, too, Trainer.

And that's how I came to watch Fuji Kiseki's race, and what 
"enchanted" me was――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ――Haaah!!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Wh, what beautiful running…! 
Her well-polished physique moves so beautifully… that you 
can't help but be mesmerized!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Not to mention, that magnificent acceleration…! 
Just how much faster can she go!? This is exhilarating…!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
With her running, "Kiseki" will entertain everyone who 
watches her…!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That's me――dashing across the track, "Fuji Kiseki"!!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: (Woooooohhh……!!)

The cheers that erupted even though it was a mock race…! 
This proved the magnificence of what Fuji Kiseki had 
enchanted.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Fuji Kiseki! That was the greatest race…! 
I'd absolutely love to scout you, or maybe even just talk to 
you!?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Absolutely, me too!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Fufufu, glad to hear you say that! 
But, I'm sorry, I'm declining to talk about anything involving 
scouting at the moment.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
First, I want to participate in a Selection Race to show the 
trainers that come what I can do.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
So you wanted to give us an equal opportunity to assess your 
abilities and scout you… I get it. I'll look forward to the 
Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Thank you, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
As long as there is an audience expecting the "Kiseki," 
it is the entertainer's duty to satisfy their expectations to the 
best of her ability.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Look forward to the Selection Race as much as you please!

With magnificence――or perhaps, with a strength that evoked 
a sense of "resolve," Fuji Kiseki declared those words…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Indeed, no matter what stage I'm on, I entertain everyone.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: No matter what stage…
